channel.title: CVE Feed for AMP-MODE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMP-MODE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-34565|2024-08-02T02:59:21.647Z -- amp-mode -- debug%20info
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Debug Info allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Debug Info: from n/a through 1.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-37523|2024-07-21T07:09:13.531Z -- amp-mode -- login%20logo%20editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AMP-MODE Login Logo Editor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Login Logo Editor: from n/a through 1.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-34565|2024-06-04T17:42:48.616Z -- amp-mode -- debug%20info
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Debug Info allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Debug Info: from n/a through 1.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-37523|2024-07-22T13:34:40.429Z -- amp-mode -- login%20logo%20editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AMP-MODE Login Logo Editor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Login Logo Editor: from n/a through 1.3.3.
